## TextureAtlasManager.pushCanvas() method

Inserts a rectangle of a canvas to the atlas texture

**Signature:**

```typescript
pushCanvas(key: string, ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D, x: number, y: number, w: number, h: number): AtlasInfo;
```
